# deploy_new_asset

Creates a new Confidential Asset

### Parameters File

```
{
  "ticker": "CT",
  "full_name": "Confidential token",
  "total_max_supply": 100000000000000000,
  "current_supply": 1000000000000000,
  "decimal_point": 12,
  "meta_info": ""
}
```

### Command

```
deploy_new_asset <asset specs file location>
```
